pages.title: Taming
pages.text: Taming is the process by which a mob imprints on a Player, whose orders they will follow. $(br2)Most intelligent mobs can be tamed, albeit only Children can properly imprint on a Player when fed their favourite food (can be seen in that mob's entry). Do note that it may take multiple items to tame a mob.

pages.title: Commands
pages.text: Once a tamed mob grows, it will be able to accept commands (Right-Click with an empty hand), while losing some of it's less desirable behaviours, such as 'Hunting'. $(br2)The available Commands are 'Wander' (mimicks natural behaviour), 'Sit' (maintains current position) and 'Follow' (follows and supports their owner in various roles, eg. combat)

pages.title: Ownership Deed
pages.text: Mob ownership can be transferred between players through the use of an Ownership Deed.$(br2)Ownership deeds also work with other Mobs, as long as they can be tamed.
